results.title: A young girls journey to the other side of the world
results.creator_credit: Maria Sourtzis and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: This is a story of migration through the eyes of a young girl. Maria recounts the long journey by boat, the memories of Bonegilla migrant reception centre and her early life in Melbourne.
results.title_for_label: A young girls journey to the other side of the world
results.description: This is a story of migration through the eyes of a young girl. Maria recounts the long journey by boat, the memories of Bonegilla migrant reception centre and her early life in Melbourne.
description_for_label: This is a story of migration through the eyes of a young girl. Maria recounts the long journey by boat, the memories of Bonegilla migrant reception centre and her early life in Melbourne.

results.title: Birchip School: growing up in the Mallee
results.creator_credit: Astrid Scott, David Meagher, Dean Lawry, Jason White and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: Students talk about what it is like to grow up in a small rural town, discuss the pros and cons, and the impact that issues like the drought have had on their own lives.

results.creator_credit_for_label: Astrid Scott, David Meagher, Dean Lawry, Jason White and ACMI Content Development

results.title: Reid Mather - on the farm
results.creator_credit: Astrid Scott, David Meagher, Dean Lawry, Jason White and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: Reid Mather, Mayor of Buloke Shire at the time of filming, talks about his family’s own farming history and his personal relationship with the land.

results.title: Keith's story
results.brief_description: Although now struggling with Alzheimer’s disease, the stories of Keith’s achievements and adventures as told by his wife are a tribute to his inspirational life. Created as part of ‘Memory’s Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage’ in association with Vic Health and the Alzheimer’s Association.
results.description: Although now struggling with Alzheimer’s disease, the stories of Keith’s achievements and adventures as told by his wife are a tribute to his inspirational life. Created as part of ‘Memory’s Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage’ in association with Vic Health and the Alzheimer’s Association.

results.title: 3 good reasons
results.brief_description: David Hunt is a volunteer for the Heart Foundation. He speaks of his own personal tragedies and how these particular events have motivated him to dedicate his time to the Heart Foundation. Made as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.

results.title: The Heart Foundation
results.brief_description: After losing his father to a heart attack when he was young, Andrew Tonkin dedicated his life to researching heart disease. This is his story of his own experiences with the Heart Foundation. Made as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’ in association with Vic Health and the Heart Foundation.
results.description: After losing his father to a heart attack when he was young, Andrew Tonkin dedicated his life to researching heart disease. results.title: New beginnings
results.creator_credit: Stella Paraskakis and ACMI Digital Storytelling
results.brief_description: Migrating to a new country as a young girl can be an overwhelming experience. This story captures the memories of life in a new country by a young girl who migrated to Australia from Greece with her family.
results.description: Migrating to a new country as a young girl can be an overwhelming experience. This story captures the memories of life in a new country by a young girl who migrated to Australia from Greece with her family.
description_for_label: Migrating to a new country as a young girl can be an overwhelming experience. This story captures the memories of life in a new country by a young girl who migrated to Australia from Greece with her family.

results.title: Passionate pursuits
results.brief_description: This story was created for Robin Hodder’s grandchildren to celebrate his extraordinary achievements as an Olympic sportsman, a husband of 38 years and the world’s greatest dad. Created as part of the ‘Memory’s Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage’ workshop, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with Alzheimer’s Australia Vic and in partnership with VicHealth.
results.description: This story was created for Robin Hodder’s grandchildren to celebrate his extraordinary achievements as an Olympic sportsman, a husband of 38 years and the world’s greatest dad. results.title: The Irrepressible Jack Stone
results.brief_description: A heartbreaking but inspiring story about Jack Stone, the kid who lived every moment of his life to the fullest - as told by his mother. Created as part of ‘The Heart of the Story’, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with the National Heart Foundation of Australia (Victorian Division) in partnership with VicHealth. You can create your won Digital Story. Ask at the Information Desk or go to www.acmi.net.au/digitalstorytelling

results.title: The Day Before I Went Away
results.creator_credit: Guo Jian, ACMI and SBS Independent
results.brief_description: Guo Jian’s saucy and sinister reappropriation of Chinese propaganda painting techniques is heightened by this animation of his allegorical work ‘The Day Before I Went Away’.
